AddClientIDToOpenIDConnectProvider.name: AddClientIDToOpenIDConnectProvider
AddClientIDToOpenIDConnectProvider.description:
Grants permission to add a new client ID (audience) to the list of registered IDs
                                                for the specified IAM OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider resource

AddRoleToInstanceProfile.name: AddRoleToInstanceProfile
AddRoleToInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to add an IAM role to the specified instance profile

AddUserToGroup.name: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.description: Grants permission to add an IAM user to the specified IAM group

AttachGroupPolicy.name: AttachGroupPolicy
AttachGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a managed policy to the specified IAM group

AttachRolePolicy.name: AttachRolePolicy
AttachRolePolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a managed policy to the specified IAM role

AttachUserPolicy.name: AttachUserPolicy
AttachUserPolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a managed policy to the specified IAM user

ChangePassword.name: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.description: Grants permission for an IAM user to to change their own password

CreateAccessKey.name: CreateAccessKey
CreateAccessKey.description:
Grants permission to create access key and secret access key for the specified IAM
                                                user

CreateAccountAlias.name: CreateAccountAlias
CreateAccountAlias.description: Grants permission to create an alias for your AWS account

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a new group

CreateInstanceProfile.name: CreateInstanceProfile
CreateInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to create a new instance profile

CreateLoginProfile.name: CreateLoginProfile
CreateLoginProfile.description: Grants permission to create a password for the specified IAM user

CreateOpenIDConnectProvider.name: CreateOpenIDConnectProvider
CreateOpenIDConnectProvider.description:
Grants permission to create an IAM resource that describes an identity provider (IdP)
                                                that supports OpenID Connect (OIDC)

CreatePolicy.name: CreatePolicy
CreatePolicy.description: Grants permission to create a new managed policy

CreatePolicyVersion.name: CreatePolicyVersion
CreatePolicyVersion.description: Grants permission to create a new version of the specified managed policy

CreateRole.name: CreateRole
CreateRole.description: Grants permission to create a new role

CreateSAMLProvider.name: CreateSAMLProvider
CreateSAMLProvider.description:
Grants permission to create an IAM resource that describes an identity provider (IdP)
                                                that supports SAML 2.0

CreateServiceLinkedRole.name: CreateServiceLinkedRole
CreateServiceLinkedRole.description:
Grants permission to create an IAM role that allows an AWS service to perform actions
                                                on your behalf

CreateServiceSpecificCredential.name: CreateServiceSpecificCredential
CreateServiceSpecificCredential.description: Grants permission to create a new service-specific credential for an IAM user

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a new IAM user

CreateVirtualMFADevice.name: CreateVirtualMFADevice
CreateVirtualMFADevice.description: Grants permission to create a new virtual MFA device

DeactivateMFADevice.name: DeactivateMFADevice
DeactivateMFADevice.description:
Grants permission to deactivate the specified MFA device and remove its association
                                                with the IAM user for which it was originally enabled

DeleteAccessKey.name: DeleteAccessKey
DeleteAccessKey.description:
Grants permission to delete the access key pair that is associated with the specified
                                                IAM user

DeleteAccountAlias.name: DeleteAccountAlias
DeleteAccountAlias.description: Grants permission to delete the specified AWS account alias

DeleteAccountPasswordPolicy.name: DeleteAccountPasswordPolicy
DeleteAccountPasswordPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the password policy for the AWS account

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified IAM group

DeleteGroupPolicy.name: DeleteGroupPolicy
DeleteGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified inline policy from its group

DeleteInstanceProfile.name: DeleteInstanceProfile
DeleteInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to delete the specified instance profile

DeleteLoginProfile.name: DeleteLoginProfile
DeleteLoginProfile.description: Grants permission to delete the password for the specified IAM user

DeleteOpenIDConnectProvider.name: DeleteOpenIDConnectProvider
DeleteOpenIDConnectProvider.description:
Grants permission to delete an OpenID Connect identity provider (IdP) resource object
                                                in IAM

DeletePolicy.name: DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy.description:
Grants permission to delete the specified managed policy and remove it from any IAM
                                                entities (users, groups, or roles) to which it is attached

DeletePolicyVersion.name: DeletePolicyVersion
DeletePolicyVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a version from the specified managed policy

DeleteRole.name: DeleteRole
DeleteRole.description: Grants permission to delete the specified role

DeleteRolePermissionsBoundary.name: DeleteRolePermissionsBoundary
DeleteRolePermissionsBoundary.description: Grants permission to remove the permissions boundary from a role

DeleteRolePolicy.name: DeleteRolePolicy
DeleteRolePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified inline policy from the specified role

DeleteSAMLProvider.name: DeleteSAMLProvider
DeleteSAMLProvider.description: Grants permission to delete a SAML provider resource in IAM

DeleteSSHPublicKey.name: DeleteSSHPublicKey
DeleteSSHPublicKey.description: Grants permission to delete the specified SSH public key

DeleteServerCertificate.name: DeleteServerCertificate
DeleteServerCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete the specified server certificate

DeleteServiceLinkedRole.name: DeleteServiceLinkedRole
DeleteServiceLinkedRole.description:
Grants permission to delete an IAM role that is linked to a specific AWS service,
                                                if the service is no longer using it

DeleteServiceSpecificCredential.name: DeleteServiceSpecificCredential
DeleteServiceSpecificCredential.description: Grants permission to delete the specified service-specific credential for an IAM user

DeleteSigningCertificate.name: DeleteSigningCertificate
DeleteSigningCertificate.description:
Grants permission to delete a signing certificate that is associated with the specified
                                                IAM user

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete the specified IAM user

DeleteUserPermissionsBoundary.name: DeleteUserPermissionsBoundary
DeleteUserPermissionsBoundary.description: Grants permission to remove the permissions boundary from the specified IAM user

DeleteUserPolicy.name: DeleteUserPolicy
DeleteUserPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified inline policy from an IAM user

DeleteVirtualMFADevice.name: DeleteVirtualMFADevice
DeleteVirtualMFADevice.description: Grants permission to delete a virtual MFA device

DetachGroupPolicy.name: DetachGroupPolicy
DetachGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to detach a managed policy from the specified IAM group

DetachRolePolicy.name: DetachRolePolicy
DetachRolePolicy.description: Grants permission to detach a managed policy from the specified role

DetachUserPolicy.name: DetachUserPolicy
DetachUserPolicy.description: Grants permission to detach a managed policy from the specified IAM user

EnableMFADevice.name: EnableMFADevice
EnableMFADevice.description:
Grants permission to enable an MFA device and associate it with the specified IAM
                                                user

GenerateCredentialReport.name: GenerateCredentialReport
GenerateCredentialReport.description: Grants permission to generate a credential report for the AWS account

GenerateOrganizationsAccessReport.name: GenerateOrganizationsAccessReport
GenerateOrganizationsAccessReport.description: Grants permission to generate an access report for an AWS Organizations entity

organizations:DescribePolicy
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   organizations:ListChildren

                                                   organizations:ListTargetsForPolicy

GenerateServiceLastAccessedDetails.name: GenerateServiceLastAccessedDetails
GenerateServiceLastAccessedDetails.description: Grants permission to generate a service last accessed data report for an IAM resource

GetAccessKeyLastUsed.name: GetAccessKeyLastUsed
GetAccessKeyLastUsed.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about when the specified access key was
                                                last used

GetAccountAuthorizationDetails.name: GetAccountAuthorizationDetails
GetAccountAuthorizationDetails.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about all IAM users, groups, roles, and
                                                policies in your AWS account, including their relationships to one another

GetAccountPasswordPolicy.name: GetAccountPasswordPolicy
GetAccountPasswordPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the password policy for the AWS account

GetAccountSummary.name: GetAccountSummary
GetAccountSummary.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about IAM entity usage and IAM quotas in
                                                the AWS account

GetContextKeysForCustomPolicy.name: GetContextKeysForCustomPolicy
GetContextKeysForCustomPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of all of the context keys that are referenced
                                                in the specified policy

GetContextKeysForPrincipalPolicy.name: GetContextKeysForPrincipalPolicy
GetContextKeysForPrincipalPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of all context keys that are referenced in all
                                                IAM policies that are attached to the specified IAM identity (user, group, or role)

GetCredentialReport.name: GetCredentialReport
GetCredentialReport.description: Grants permission to retrieve a credential report for the AWS account

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of IAM users in the specified IAM group

GetGroupPolicy.name: GetGroupPolicy
GetGroupPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified
                                                IAM group

GetInstanceProfile.name: GetInstanceProfile
GetInstanceProfile.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified instance profile, including
                                                the instance profile's path, GUID, ARN, and role

GetLoginProfile.name: GetLoginProfile
GetLoginProfile.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the user name and password creation date for the specified
                                                IAM user

GetOpenIDConnectProvider.name: GetOpenIDConnectProvider
GetOpenIDConnectProvider.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified OpenID Connect (OIDC)
                                                provider resource in IAM

GetOrganizationsAccessReport.name: GetOrganizationsAccessReport
GetOrganizationsAccessReport.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Organizations access report

GetPolicy.name: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified managed policy, including
                                                the policy's default version and the total number of identities to which the policy
                                                is attached

GetPolicyVersion.name: GetPolicyVersion
GetPolicyVersion.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a version of the specified managed
                                                policy, including the policy document

GetRole.name: GetRole
GetRole.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified role, including the
                                                role's path, GUID, ARN, and the role's trust policy

GetRolePolicy.name: GetRolePolicy
GetRolePolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve an inline policy document that is embedded with the
                                                specified IAM role

GetSAMLProvider.name: GetSAMLProvider
GetSAMLProvider.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the SAML provider metadocument that was uploaded when
                                                the IAM SAML provider resource was created or updated

GetSSHPublicKey.name: GetSSHPublicKey
GetSSHPublicKey.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the specified SSH public key, including metadata about
                                                the key

GetServerCertificate.name: GetServerCertificate
GetServerCertificate.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified server certificate stored
                                                in IAM

GetServiceLastAccessedDetails.name: GetServiceLastAccessedDetails
GetServiceLastAccessedDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the service last accessed data report

GetServiceLastAccessedDetailsWithEntitie.name: GetServiceLastAccessedDetailsWithEntities
GetServiceLastAccessedDetailsWithEntitie.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the entities from the service last
                                                accessed data report

GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus.name: GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus
GetServiceLinkedRoleDeletionStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve an IAM service-linked role deletion status

GetUser.name: GetUser
GetUser.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified IAM user, including
                                                the user's creation date, path, unique ID, and ARN

GetUserPolicy.name: GetUserPolicy
GetUserPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified
                                                IAM user

ListAccessKeys.description:
Grants permission to list information about the access key IDs that are associated
                                                with the specified IAM user

ListAccountAliases.description: Grants permission to list the account alias that is associated with the AWS account

ListAttachedGroupPolicies.description:
Grants permission to list all managed policies that are attached to the specified
                                                IAM group

ListAttachedRolePolicies.description:
Grants permission to list all managed policies that are attached to the specified
                                                IAM role

ListAttachedUserPolicies.description:
Grants permission to list all managed policies that are attached to the specified
                                                IAM user

Grants permission to list all IAM identities to which the specified managed policy

ListGroupPolicies.name: ListGroupPolicies
ListGroupPolicies.description:
Grants permission to list the names of the inline policies that are embedded in the
                                                specified IAM group

ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list the IAM groups that have the specified path prefix

ListGroupsForUser.name: ListGroupsForUser
ListGroupsForUser.description: Grants permission to list the IAM groups that the specified IAM user belongs to

ListInstanceProfiles.name: ListInstanceProfiles
ListInstanceProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the instance profiles that have the specified path prefix

ListInstanceProfilesForRole.description:
Grants permission to list the instance profiles that have the specified associated
                                                IAM role

ListMFADevices.description: Grants permission to list the MFA devices for an IAM user

ListOpenIDConnectProviders.description:
Grants permission to list information about the IAM OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider

ListPolicies.description: Grants permission to list all managed policies

ListPoliciesGrantingServiceAccess.description:
Grants permission to list information about the policies that grant an entity access

ListPolicyVersions.description:
Grants permission to list information about the versions of the specified managed
                                                policy, including the version that is currently set as the policy's default version

ListRolePolicies.description:
Grants permission to list the names of the inline policies that are embedded in the
                                                specified IAM role

ListRoleTags.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are attached to the specified IAM role.

ListRoles.name: ListRoles
ListRoles.description: Grants permission to list the IAM roles that have the specified path prefix

ListSAMLProviders.name: ListSAMLProviders
ListSAMLProviders.description: Grants permission to list the SAML provider resources in IAM

ListSSHPublicKeys.name: ListSSHPublicKeys
ListSSHPublicKeys.description:
Grants permission to list information about the SSH public keys that are associated
                                                with the specified IAM user

ListServerCertificates.name: ListServerCertificates
ListServerCertificates.description: Grants permission to list the server certificates that have the specified path prefix

ListServiceSpecificCredentials.name: ListServiceSpecificCredentials
ListServiceSpecificCredentials.description:
Grants permission to list the service-specific credentials that are associated with
                                                the specified IAM user

ListSigningCertificates.name: ListSigningCertificates
ListSigningCertificates.description:
Grants permission to list information about the signing certificates that are associated
                                                with the specified IAM user

ListUserPolicies.name: ListUserPolicies
ListUserPolicies.description:
Grants permission to list the names of the inline policies that are embedded in the
                                                specified IAM user

ListUserTags.name: ListUserTags
ListUserTags.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are attached to the specified IAM user.

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permission to list the IAM users that have the specified path prefix

ListVirtualMFADevices.name: ListVirtualMFADevices
ListVirtualMFADevices.description: Grants permission to list virtual MFA devices by assignment status

PassRole.name: PassRole
PassRole.description: Grants permission to pass a role to a service

PutGroupPolicy.description:
Grants permission to create or update an inline policy document that is embedded in
                                                the specified IAM group

PutRolePermissionsBoundary.name: PutRolePermissionsBoundary
PutRolePermissionsBoundary.description: Grants permission to set a managed policy as a permissions boundary for a role

PutRolePolicy.name: PutRolePolicy
PutRolePolicy.description:
Grants permission to create or update an inline policy document that is embedded in
                                                the specified IAM role

PutUserPermissionsBoundary.name: PutUserPermissionsBoundary
PutUserPermissionsBoundary.description: Grants permission to set a managed policy as a permissions boundary for an IAM user

PutUserPolicy.name: PutUserPolicy
PutUserPolicy.description:
Grants permission to create or update an inline policy document that is embedded in
                                                the specified IAM user

RemoveClientIDFromOpenIDConnectProvider.name: RemoveClientIDFromOpenIDConnectProvider
RemoveClientIDFromOpenIDConnectProvider.description:
Grants permission to remove the client ID (audience) from the list of client IDs in
                                                the specified IAM OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider resource

RemoveRoleFromInstanceProfile.name: RemoveRoleFromInstanceProfile
RemoveRoleFromInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to remove an IAM role from the specified EC2 instance profile

RemoveUserFromGroup.name: RemoveUserFromGroup
RemoveUserFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove an IAM user from the specified group

ResetServiceSpecificCredential.name: ResetServiceSpecificCredential
ResetServiceSpecificCredential.description:
Grants permission to reset the password for an existing service-specific credential
                                                for an IAM user

ResyncMFADevice.name: ResyncMFADevice
ResyncMFADevice.description:
Grants permission to synchronize the specified MFA device with its IAM entity (user
                                                or role)

SetDefaultPolicyVersion.name: SetDefaultPolicyVersion
SetDefaultPolicyVersion.description:
Grants permission to set the version of the specified policy as the policy's default
                                                version

SetSecurityTokenServicePreferences.name: SetSecurityTokenServicePreferences
SetSecurityTokenServicePreferences.description: Grants permission to set the STS global endpoint token version

SimulateCustomPolicy.name: SimulateCustomPolicy
SimulateCustomPolicy.description:
Grants permission to simulate whether an identity-based policy or resource-based policy
                                                provides permissions for specific API operations and resources

SimulatePrincipalPolicy.name: SimulatePrincipalPolicy
SimulatePrincipalPolicy.description:
Grants permission to simulate whether an identity-based policy that is attached to
                                                a specified IAM entity (user or role) provides permissions for specific API operations
                                                and resources

TagRole.name: TagRole
TagRole.description: Grants permission to add tags to an IAM role.

TagUser.name: TagUser
TagUser.description: Grants permission to add tags to an IAM user.

UntagRole.name: UntagRole
UntagRole.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the role.

UntagUser.name: UntagUser
UntagUser.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the user.

UpdateAccessKey.name: UpdateAccessKey
UpdateAccessKey.description: Grants permission to update the status of the specified access key as Active or Inactive

UpdateAccountPasswordPolicy.name: UpdateAccountPasswordPolicy
UpdateAccountPasswordPolicy.description: Grants permission to update the password policy settings for the AWS account

UpdateAssumeRolePolicy.name: UpdateAssumeRolePolicy
UpdateAssumeRolePolicy.description:
Grants permission to update the policy that grants an IAM entity permission to assume
                                                a role

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update the name or path of the specified IAM group

UpdateLoginProfile.name: UpdateLoginProfile
UpdateLoginProfile.description: Grants permission to change the password for the specified IAM user

UpdateOpenIDConnectProviderThumbprint.name: UpdateOpenIDConnectProviderThumbprint
UpdateOpenIDConnectProviderThumbprint.description:
Grants permission to update the entire list of server certificate thumbprints that
                                                are associated with an OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider resource

UpdateRole.name: UpdateRole
UpdateRole.description:
Grants permission to update the description or maximum session duration setting of
                                                a role

UpdateRoleDescription.name: UpdateRoleDescription
UpdateRoleDescription.description: Grants permission to update only the description of a role

UpdateSAMLProvider.name: UpdateSAMLProvider
UpdateSAMLProvider.description: Grants permission to update the metadata document for an existing SAML provider resource

UpdateSSHPublicKey.name: UpdateSSHPublicKey
UpdateSSHPublicKey.description:
Grants permission to update the status of an IAM user's SSH public key to active or
                                                inactive

UpdateServerCertificate.name: UpdateServerCertificate
UpdateServerCertificate.description:
Grants permission to update the name or the path of the specified server certificate
                                                stored in IAM

UpdateServiceSpecificCredential.name: UpdateServiceSpecificCredential
UpdateServiceSpecificCredential.description:
Grants permission to update the status of a service-specific credential to active
                                                or inactive for an IAM user

UpdateSigningCertificate.name: UpdateSigningCertificate
UpdateSigningCertificate.description:
Grants permission to update the status of the specified user signing certificate to
                                                active or disabled

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description: Grants permission to update the name or the path of the specified IAM user

UploadSSHPublicKey.name: UploadSSHPublicKey
UploadSSHPublicKey.description:
Grants permission to upload an SSH public key and associate it with the specified
                                                IAM user

UploadServerCertificate.name: UploadServerCertificate
UploadServerCertificate.description: Grants permission to upload a server certificate entity for the AWS account

UploadSigningCertificate.name: UploadSigningCertificate
UploadSigningCertificate.description:
Grants permission to upload an X.509 signing certificate and associate it with the
                                                specified IAM user
